text: "Hello America" is a 1980 song by English heavy metal band Def Leppard and was taken from their debut studio album On Through the Night. It went to number 45 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== ===7": Vertigo â€“ Phonogram / LEPP1 (UK)=== # "Hello America" # "Good Morning Freedom" ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Def Leppard songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Hello America (song)
